original_text: So David did as the Lord had commanded him to do. His men chased the Philistines all the way from Gibeon to Gezer.
korean_text: 이에 다윗이 여호와의 명령대로 행하여 블레셋 사람을 쳐서 게바에서 게셀까지 이르니라

sentences.original_text: So David did as the Lord had commanded him to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 다윗은 주께서 그에게 명하신 대로 행했다.

sentences.original_text: all the way from Gibeon to Gezer.
